subject: Attention Dear beneficiary:  Debra
body:
STANDARD  CHARTERED  BANK  UGANDA
Plot No. 9, William Street 5 Speke Road, Kampala,Uganda 
Direct Bank Phone  No: +256-7589-90-661
Director Whats-app No:+256-704-265-875
Email: standardcharteredbankofuganda@aol.com
The Director,Foreign Currency Transfer Dept

Attention Dear beneficiary:  Debra  
 
You are welcome to Standard Chartered Bank Uganda I am Mr. Albert Thomas Chief operating officer Director, Credit / Telex and Your details were forwarded to us earlier by Mr Richard Moore Director of western union, declaring you as a beneficiary to receive the Donations compensation funds from UN Representative Kampala  total sum of $1.750.000) and We acknowledged receipt of your mail. Regarding the Donation of $1.750.000 Million United State Dollars. And Your $1.750.000 was deposited in our bank  Standard Chartered Bank Uganda  It was deposited in our bank in your name. And we have 2 options of payment below.

Payment Option/Preferred mode of payment:
 
Option (1). 24 Hours Bank Telegraphic Wire Transfer...................... ( Bank Transfer And Service Charge is $175  USD )

Option (2). 48 Hours Delivery of ATM Visa Card to your address which attracts a delivery charge of $155  USD)


NOTE: If you don't wish to go for bank wire transfer, You can go for ATM CARD can be mailed to you, as we have 2 OPTIONS of payment above: WE will transfer your $1.750.000 to your bank account number immediately you pay the charge. The charge can not be deducted because there was instruction placed on your amount by the Uganda Government that no charges should be deducted for security purposes.
 
Reason why you have to pay the sum of $175  USD for bank service charge is to enable us to obtain (F.C.T.C) Foreign Transfer Code which we will use to Transfer your $1.750.000 into your bank account and we will transfer your amount directly to your bank account. We assure you, As soon as you pay the charges, We will obtain the code and your transfer will take place immediately and within 24 hours,Your $1.750.000 Million Us Dollars will be credited into your Bank Account, But if you can't afford the bank wire transfer charge. You can go for ATM CARD  can be mailed to you By DHL Courier Company.
 
You are required to make your choice of payment from the Three options presented to you and get back to us to enable us to give you the payment instructions. Get back to me on your immediate receipt of this message to confirm your choice.

     Best Regards, Yours Faithfully,      Mr. Albert Thomas    Chief operating officer.Director, Credit / Telex Dept.      Standard Chartered Bank Uganda. Direct Bank Phone  No: +256-7589-90-661 
  Director Whats-app No:+256-704-265-875

     Best Regards, Yours Faithfully,      Mr. Albert Thomas    Chief operating officer.Director, Credit / Telex Dept.      Standard Chartered Bank Uganda. Direct Bank Phone  No: +256-7589-90-661 
  Director Whats-app No:+256-704-265-875

subject: Re: Attention Dear beneficiary:  Debra
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information. I'm quite flattered by the attention my case is receiving. 

I must say, this all sounds very exciting! The idea of receiving such a large sum is almost overwhelming. However, I do have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the Foreign Transfer Code? What exactly is it and why is it necessary for the transfer?

Secondly, regarding the payment options, could you provide more details about how each one works? For example, if I choose the Bank Wire Transfer option, what would be the process? And similarly for the ATM Visa Card option?

Lastly, could you tell me more about DHL Courier Company? How reliable are they and how long would it take for them to deliver the ATM Visa Card to my address?

I look forward to your response. Thank you once again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Re: TRANSFER OF YOUR DONATIONS FUNDS $1.750.000
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about this donation of Million United State Dollars. 

I'm curious, how did my name come up for this? And could you tell me more about the UN Kampala donations? It sounds like an interesting initiative.

As for the payment options, I'm not sure which one would be best for me. Could you provide more details on how the Bank Wire Transfer and ATM Visa Card delivery work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Debra
